text: Anne McEnroe (born c.1956) is an American film actress who had roles in the 1980s and 1990s, including Wall Street and Beetlejuice. She is married to Edward R. Pressman, whom she met on the set of The Hand, which he produced. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film and television |- ! Year ! Title !
